players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob, you've been silent all night. That's odd. I think you might be mafia. Diana's claim could be a bluff."
Bob: "I was with Alice all night, didn't see anyone, I think the mafia is Alice."
Diana: "I investigated Alice—she is mafia. Bob was with her; she knows I'm detective. Let's vote Alice."
You: "Bob, if you were with me all night, why didn't you see anyone? Diana, your claim that you investigated me and found me mafia seems shaky. Anyone else?"
Diana: "Bob, you say you saw nothing but you were with Alice all night. How can you be so sure? Alice knows I'm detective but keeps denying her guilt. Vote Alice."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Bob, you've been silent all night. That's odd. I think you might be mafia. Diana's claim could be a bluff."
You: "I was with Alice all night, didn't see anyone, I think the mafia is Alice."
Diana: "I investigated Alice—she is mafia. Bob was with her; she knows I'm detective. Let's vote Alice."
Alice: "Bob, if you were with me all night, why didn't you see anyone? Diana, your claim that you investigated me and found me mafia seems shaky. Anyone else?"
Diana: "Bob, you say you saw nothing but you were with Alice all night. How can you be so sure? Alice knows I'm detective but keeps denying her guilt. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
